data.title: Membership
data.meta_description: Membership in The IIA is a critical component of your overall strategy for career success.
data.text:
In addition to the benefits of IIA membership, IIA Malawi members enjoy:

Provision of IIAM awards to BCOMIA students

Use of the Institute's library by BCOMIA students.

IIAM undertaking internal audit recruitment consultancy.

Access to free tuition on specific bodies of knowledge.

Join IIA Malawi

To become a member of IIA Malawi, please fill out and mail the Membership Application Form below
